original_text: But when Esther came before the king, he commanded by letters that his wicked device, which he devised against the Jews, should return upon his own head, and that he and his sons should be hanged on the gallows.
korean_text: 에스더가 왕 앞에 나아감으로 말미암아 왕이 조서를 내려 하만이 유다인을 해하려던 악한 꾀를 그의 머리에 돌려보내어 하만과 그의 여러 아들을 나무에 달게 하였으므로

sentences.original_text: But when Esther came before the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 에스더가 왕 앞에 나왔을 때

sentences.original_text: which he devised against the Jews
should return upon his own head
and that he and his sons
should be hanged on the gallows
